ygData.subject: Re: All this talk
ygData.msgSnippet: ... back ... are ... It debuffs the enemy and adds the str to you, very handy :) I usually cast it just as a debuff, even if I still have some other mob s str,
ygData.messageBody:
> From: XxKommiexX@...
>
> All this talk is making me want to go back to my level 9 necromancer. Gee
> wiz. Right now I have Dark Elf Cleric, and Troll. But who knows, may go
back
> to necromancer. Especially about that mail of killing giant scarabs that
are
> red. Oh ya, what is the point of Siphon Strength? Just sucks str right?

It debuffs the enemy and adds the str to you, very handy :) I usually cast
it just as a debuff, even if I still have some other mob's str, they do less
damage that way, of course if you have a shaman or enchanter or someone who
can cast a better debuff, save the mana.
